properties.areaDesc: Outer Saginaw Bay SW of Alabaster to Port Austin MI to Inner Saginaw Bay; Port Austin to Harbor Beach MI; Inner Saginaw Bay SW of Point Au Gres to Bay Port MI
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 5 at 10:02PM EST until January 6 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Expect sustained winds up to 25 knots from the west
with gusts up to 35 knots. The largest significant waves will
be 5 feet with a potential maximum wave height of 7 feet.

* WHERE...Port Austin to Harbor Beach MI, Inner Saginaw Bay SW
of Point Au Gres to Bay Port MI and Outer Saginaw Bay SW of
Alabaster to Port Austin MI to Inner Saginaw Bay.

* WHEN...The maximum winds are expected around 2 AM EST Monday
with the largest waves expected around 4 AM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST MONDAY
